no_permission.reload: <red>You don't have permission to reload configuration.</red>
no_permission.rank: <red>You don't have permission to manage ranks.</red>
no_permission.assign: <red>You don't have permission to assign ranks.</red>
no_permission.setrank: <red>You don't have permission to set ranks.</red>
no_permission.removerank: <red>You don't have permission to remove ranks.</red>
no_permission.playerinfo: <red>You don't have permission to view player info.</red>
no_permission.adminchat: <red>You don't have permission to use admin chat.</red>

error.home_not_found: <red>Home '<yellow>%s</yellow>' not found. Use <yellow>/sethome %s</yellow> to set it.</red>
error.warp_not_found: <red>Warp '<yellow>%s</yellow>' not found. Use <yellow>/warps</yellow> to see available warps.</red>
error.max_homes_reached: <red>You have reached the maximum number of homes (<yellow>%d</yellow>). Delete one first using <yellow>/delhome <name></yellow></red>
error.no_homes: <red>You have no homes set. Use <yellow>/sethome</yellow> to create one.</red>
error.no_warps: <red>No warps have been set. Use <yellow>/setwarp <name></yellow> to create one.</red>
error.rtp_no_safe_location: <red>Could not find a safe location after <yellow>%d</yellow> attempts. Please try again.</red>
error.rtp_failed: <red>An error occurred while finding a safe location.</red>
error.no_reply_target: <red>You have no one to reply to.</red>
error.tpa_sender_offline: <red>The player who sent the request is no longer online.</red>
error.tpa_sender_not_available: <red>The player who sent the request is no longer available.</red>
error.already_pending_tpa: <red>You already have a pending request to this player.</red>
error.no_tpa_to_cancel: <red>You have no pending teleport requests to cancel.</red>
error.chunk_load_failed: <red>Failed to load destination chunk. Teleport cancelled.</red>

cooldown.home: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before using /home again.</orange>
cooldown.spawn: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before using /spawn again.</orange>
cooldown.back: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before using /back again.</orange>
cooldown.rtp: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before using /rtp again.</orange>
cooldown.warp: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before using /warp again.</orange>
cooldown.tpa: <orange>You must wait <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds before sending another request.</orange>

success.vanish_enabled: <green>You are now vanished. Other players cannot see you.</green>
success.vanish_disabled: <green>You are no longer vanished. Other players can now see you.</green>

info.vanish_reminder: <gray>Reminder: You are currently vanished. Other players cannot see you.</gray>
info.tpa_request_received: <orange><yellow>%s</yellow> has requested to teleport to you. Type <yellow>/tpaccept</yellow> to accept or <yellow>/tpdeny</yellow> to deny. Expires in <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds.</orange>
info.tpahere_request_received: <orange><yellow>%s</yellow> has requested you to teleport to them. Type <yellow>/tpaccept</yellow> to accept or <yellow>/tpdeny</yellow> to deny. Expires in <yellow>%d</yellow> seconds.</orange>

tpa_list.title: Teleport Requests
tpa_list.request_received: %s has requested to teleport to you. Type /tpaccept to accept or /tpdeny to deny. Expires in %d seconds.
tpa_list.request_here_received: %s has requested you to teleport to them. Type /tpaccept to accept or /tpdeny to deny. Expires in %d seconds.
